snippet.title: The Monster Breeder trailer
snippet.description:
Turn-based fantasy strategy game with RPG elements. Crossbreed various species to create powerful monster hybrids for gladiatorial combat. Manipulate the juvenile creatures’ abilities with magic and alchemy. Manage your enterprise, craft items, upgrade your base. Fight in the arena for gold and glory!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1192440/The_Monster_Breeder/
